LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_UpdateDesc: Paint overlay image (double graphic layer). Mainly used after painting.
LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_ToggleDesc: Toggle overlay image (double graphic layer). Use when objects and images do not match.
LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_ShowGizmoTip: Display a toggle button if it is possible to switch between second layers. \nTurn it off if you find it annoying. \nEven if disabled, the color update button will still be show.
LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_ShowUpdateGizmoTip: Display an update button if it is possible to switch between second layers. \nTurn it off if you find it annoying.
LanguageData.DoubleGraphicLayer_DefaultToggleTip: Whether to show second layers by default.\nEven if off, you can still enable it individually.
